name: Friday Night Funkin' Dusttale Alternative Route: Betrayal
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' Dusttale Alternative Route: Betrayal
description:
I literally thought of this idea like 3 days prior to the release

Also I can't think of any good idea for the main story/purpose of this mod, so I just went with my gut.

By the way, the mod's song is copyrighted, but not HEAVILY copyrighted, so upload this onto YouTube if you don't mind/care not having any Ad Revenue in your video.
